title: Loving Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan, Western, Take-out, Asian, Fusion, Colombian
description: Cocina vegana. Part of international chain of vegan restaurants inspired by Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Each location is individual family operated. Serves vegan food (like falafel, salad, burger), non-alcoholic beverages, and vegan desserts. Also sells health food products, farm produce, and offers vegan cooking course on Saturdays.
